subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Klotz was the founder and owner of the Washington Generals, the Globetrotters’ hapless, perennial opponent. But he had one moment of glory as their two-handed-set-shot artist.
snippet: Klotz was the founder and owner of the Washington Generals, the Globetrotters’ hapless, perennial opponent. But he had one moment of glory as their two-handed-set-shot artist.
